name: OneSatOrdinalsBSV
shortDescription: Adds easy management of 1SatOrdinals and BSV in your GDevelop game.
description: Allows you to integrate 1SatOrdinals and BSV into your GDevelop game, as well as a few extra utilities, such as signing messages. Here is a full list of functionality:
- Checking is a wallet has a specific ordinal
- Converting Private Keys to Public Keys and Addresses
- Checking if user has ordinal in collection
- Setting sprites and resources to ordinals
- Marketplace, both everything with an OrdLock and just from specific collections

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if the specified address has a specific ordinal.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if address has an ordinal
eventsFunctions.name: Address_Ordinal_Check_Action
eventsFunctions.sentence: Check if _PARAM1_ has _PARAM2_

parameters.description: Address
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: Ordinal origin
parameters.name: origin

parameters.description: Variable to store result in
parameters.name: returnvar

eventsFunctions.description: Generates a private key in the Wallet Import Format.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Generate a WIF
eventsFunctions.name: Generate_WIF
eventsFunctions.sentence: Generate a Private Key in WIF Format

eventsFunctions.description: Returns a signature, in base64, with the specified private key. Useful for authentication and proving ownership over an address.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Create a signature with a private key
eventsFunctions.name: Create_Signature

parameters.description: Data that you want signed
parameters.name: Message

parameters.description: Private Key that will be used to sign the message
parameters.name: PrivKey

eventsFunctions.description: Allows you to verify whether a signature is created by a specific address, given its public key and the message. Returns 1 if true and 0 if false.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Verify a signature using a public key
eventsFunctions.name: Verify_Signature

parameters.description: The message used to create the signature
parameters.name: Message

parameters.description: Public Key that corresponds to the Private Key that created the signature
parameters.name: PublicKey

parameters.description: Signature, in base64
parameters.name: Sig

eventsFunctions.description: Replaces the image contained by a resource by a new one, from an ordinal outpoint. This will update all sprites displaying the resource.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load Ordinal into an image resource
eventsFunctions.name: Load_Ordinal_Into_Image_Resource_Action
eventsFunctions.sentence: Load Ordinal _PARAM1_ into resource _PARAM2_

parameters.description: The URL to load the new image for the resource from
parameters.name: URL

parameters.description: The resource to modify
parameters.name: Resource

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if an address has any ordinal in a specific collection.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Checks if an address has an ordinal in a collection
eventsFunctions.name: Does_Address_Have_Ord_In_Collection_Action
eventsFunctions.sentence: Does _PARAM1_ have an ordinal in _PARAM2_ and return result to _PARAM3_

parameters.description: Address that you wish to check
parameters.name: Address

parameters.description: Collection that you wish to check
parameters.name: CollectionID

parameters.description: Variable that you wish to return the result to
parameters.name: ReturnTo

eventsFunctions.description: Allows you to get all ordinals in a collection, also allowing you to filter out those on sale. May cause issues with incredibly large collections. Returns the outpoints.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Get the ordinals in a collection
eventsFunctions.name: Get_Ordinals_In_Collection_Action
eventsFunctions.sentence: Get _PARAM1_ ordinals in _PARAM2_ and return to _PARAM3_

parameters.description: Maximum amount of ordinal outpoints that can be returned
parameters.name: Limit

parameters.description: The Collection ID of the collection you wish to get ordinals from
parameters.name: CollectionID

parameters.description: Array Variable to return outpoints to
parameters.name: ReturnTo

parameters.description: Offset of owned ordinals. Useful for Pageination
parameters.name: Offset

parameters.description: Get all ordinals (Yes) or just those for sale (No), still limited by the specified limit
parameters.name: GetAll

eventsFunctions.description: Loads the specified ordinal into the specified sprite. This will only affect the sprite in question and only until the image in it is changed through its animation or another action, unless you also modify the resource.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load Ordinal into a Sprite
eventsFunctions.name: Load_Ordinal_Into_Sprite_Action
eventsFunctions.sentence: Load _PARAM1_ into _PARAM2_ (and into the corresponding resource: _PARAM3_)

inlineCode: for (const obj of objects) obj.getRendererObject().texture = texture;

parameters.description: The Ordinal's Outpoint that you wish to load
parameters.name: Ordinal

parameters.description: The sprite you wish to modify
parameters.name: Object

parameters.description: Modify the resource?
parameters.longDescription: If yes, modifies the image contained in the resource of the sprite's current frame instead of just the sprite's displayed image. This makes the changes affect all other sprites that also display this resource, and allows the change to persist after changing animations or the current frame.
parameters.name: ChangeResource
